description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Liquity USD, a synthetic USD stablecoin collateralized with Ether.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Liquity USD, a synthetic USD stablecoin collateralized with Ether.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Liquity USD, a synthetic USD stablecoin collateralized with Ether.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool de fábrica contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y Liquity USD, una moneda estable USD sintética garantizada con Ether.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu fabrika meta havuzu, 3Crv (DAI, USDC ve USDT) ve Ether ile teminatlandırılmış sentetik bir USD istikrarlı parası olan Liquity USD'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Liquity USD, a synthetic USD stablecoin collateralized with Ether.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 3Crv (DAI, USDC, USDT) 和 Liquity USD，Liquity USD 是以 ETH 为抵押品铸造的合成美元稳定币。
